title: Cant connect to severs for ages then constance DC riot help
body:
so the last game few i played i was dc'd  then it wouldnt let me  get back into the game for 10min. when i finally connected i got leave buster
riot can you please remove me from leaverbuster i should not be held accountable for server issues while i was playing

replies.body:
Actually, it's not the server, it's your own connection. As horrible as this may seem, it's the harsh reality. Other than that I ( as a victim of the plague called Lag ) can only suggest that you play during times where a smaller amount of people in your office/household are present/or using the internet connection available in your "play area"...

Another tip I can give you is to, connect your device directly into the wall socket (Ethernet) as appose to the good old WI-FI as Ethernet tends to be far more reliable (in most cases at least.)
